com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.burstly
Class OverlayContainer<T extends View & IActivityLifeCycleAware>

java.lang.Object
  com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.burstly.OverlayContainer<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
IOverlayContainer, IActivityLifeCycleAware
Direct Known Subclasses:
FullscreenOverlayContainer
public abstract class OverlayContainer<T extends View & IActivityLifeCycleAware>
extends Object
implements IActivityLifeCycleAware, IOverlayContainer

Overlayed container shows given child on the top of given parent in stack-like manner.

Author:
Alexey Redinskii
